description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_EN: Hong Kong West Kowloon Station Public Car Park Now Full
description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_CN: 香港西九龍站公眾停車場現已泊滿

2025-06-21T14:42:00.CONTENT_EN: All car parks at West Kowloon Cultural District are full. Members of the public are encouraged to take public transport to the West Kowloon Cultural District.
2025-06-21T14:42:00.CONTENT_CN: 西九文化區內所有停車場現已泊滿車輛，前往西九文化區一帶的市民請使用公共交通工具。

description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_EN: Tuen Ma Line extra travelling time

2025-06-22T11:23:00.CONTENT_EN: Transport Department has received notification from MTR Corporation Limited that Tuen Ma Line extra travelling time
2025-06-22T11:23:00.CONTENT_CN: 運輸署接獲港鐵公司通知， 屯馬綫額外行車時間

2025-06-22T11:27:00.CONTENT_EN: Transport Department has received notification from MTR Corporation Limited that Due to a signalling equipment fault near Tai Wai Station, the total journey time between Tuen Mun Station and Wu Kai Sha Station could be extended by 15-20 minutes.
2025-06-22T11:27:00.CONTENT_CN: 運輸署接獲港鐵公司通知， 由於大圍站附近信號設備故障,來往屯門站及烏溪沙站的行車時間預計需要額外15-20分鐘。

2025-06-22T11:48:00.CONTENT_EN: Transport Department has received notification from MTR Corporation Limited that due to a signalling equipment fault near Tai Wai Station, the total journey time from Tuen Mun Station to Wu Kai Sha Station could be extended by 5-8 minutes.
2025-06-22T11:48:00.CONTENT_CN: 運輸署接獲港鐵公司通知，由於大圍站附近信號設備故障,由屯門站往烏溪沙站的行車時間預計需要額外5-8分鐘。

2025-06-22T23:31:49.CONTENT_EN: As more cross-boundary vehicles are returning to Hong Kong via the Hong Kong-Zhuhai-Macao Bridge (HZMB), the inbound vehicle clearance plaza of the HZMB Hong Kong Port is very busy now. Affected motorists please follow the instruction of on-site staff, drive with care and be patient while queuing.
2025-06-22T23:31:49.CONTENT_CN: 由於有較多跨境車輛經港珠澳大橋回港，港珠澳大橋香港口岸的入境車輛通關廣場現時非常繁忙，請受影響的駕駛人士依照現場工作人員的指示，小心駕駛及在輪候時保持忍讓。
